org.fujion.component

Class BaseComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.component.BaseComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IElementIdentifier
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasePickerItem, BaseSourcedComponent, BaseUIComponent, Content, Page, Popup, Snippet, Template, Timer

    public abstract class BaseComponent
extends Object
implements IElementIdentifier
    The abstract base class for all components.

      • findByName

        public BaseComponent findByName(String name)
        Looks up a component by its name within the namespace occupied by this component.
        Parameters:
        name - Component name or path. "^" in path means parent namespace.
        Returns:
        The component sought, or null if not found.

        Returns:

      • notifyAncestors

        public void notifyAncestors(Event event,
                            boolean includeThis)
        Send an event to all the ancestors of this component. Event propagation stops if any recipient invokes the stopPropagation method on the event.
        Parameters:
        event - Event to send.
        includeThis - If true, include this component in the recipient chain.

      • notifyDescendants

        public void notifyDescendants(Event event,
                              boolean includeThis)
        Send an event to all the descendants of this component using a depth-first traversal. Event propagation stops if any recipient invokes the stopPropagation method on the event.
        Parameters:
        event - Event to send.
        includeThis - If true, include this component in the recipient chain.

      • wireController

        @Component.PropertySetter(value="controller",
                          defer=true)
public void wireController(Object controller)
        Wires a controller's annotated components and event handlers, using this component to resolve name references.
        Parameters:
        controller - The controller to wire. If a string, is assumed to be the name of the controller's implementation class in which case an instance of that class is created.

        Type Parameters:
        T - The argument class.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
